meta.dc:subject: legislation
meta.dc:rights: the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

main.docTitle: Child Abduction and Custody (Parties to Convention) Order

subsection.content: The countries specified in column 1 of the Schedule are the Contracting States to the Convention.

The territories specified in column 2 of the Schedule are the territories specified in declarations made by the corresponding Contracting States specified in column 1 of the Schedule under Article 39 or 40 of the Convention.

The date of the coming into force of the Convention as between Hong Kong and a Contracting State or a territory specified in the Schedule is the corresponding date specified in column 3 of the Schedule. (L.N. 108 of 1999)

td.p: Territories specified in declarations under Article 39 or 40 of the Convention
Date of coming into force of the Convention
Denmark, Kingdom of (except the Faroe Islands and Greenland)
France, Republic of (for the whole of the territory of the Republic of France)
Netherlands, Kingdom of the (for the Kingdom in Europe)
Saint Kitts and Nevis, Federation of
Sri Lanka, Democratic Socialist Republic of
United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
